name: PizzaToppings
0:
”Alexa, ask Pizza Toppings which pizza toppings should I put on my pizza”
”Alexa, ask Pizza Toppings which combination of pizza toppings is good”
”Alexa, ask Pizza Toppings what pizza toppings are yummy”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: pizza toppings
des: Ask Alexa for some fun pizza toppings for your next pizza. Alexa will give you three toppings to try on your next pizza.
